title: Focus on non-technical learners
description: Humane, compassionate teaching helps non-technical folks learn technical skills without fear.

title: Training that's relevant and focused
description: Zero in on the skills you care about, not buzzwords.

title: Wide range of topics
description: Learn a language, a process, or a tool. Pick and choose the topics that are most useful to your role.

title: Focus on building competence
description: Instead of drinking from the firehose, experience a whole new pace of learning that leaves you ready to apply your skills immediately
